type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.BaseForkOptions
type.description: Fork options for compilation. Only take effect if fork is true.

method.name: getMemoryInitialSize
method.description: Returns the initial heap size for the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the JVM's default will be used.

method.name: setMemoryInitialSize
method.description: Sets the initial heap size for the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the JVM's default will be used.

method.name: setJvmArgs
method.description: Sets any additional JVM arguments for the compiler process. Defaults to the empty list.

method.name: setMemoryMaximumSize
method.description: Sets the maximum heap size for the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the JVM's default will be used.

method.name: getJvmArgs
method.description: Returns any additional JVM arguments for the compiler process. Defaults to the empty list.

method.name: getMemoryMaximumSize
method.description: Returns the maximum heap size for the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the JVM's default will be used.

property.name: memoryInitialSize
property.description: Returns the initial heap size for the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the JVM's default will be used.

property.name: memoryMaximumSize
property.description: Returns the maximum heap size for the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the JVM's default will be used.

property.name: jvmArgs
property.description: Returns any additional JVM arguments for the compiler process. Defaults to the empty list.
